typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		type as string,
		date as string,
		conversions as (id as string, type as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> getJson
source(output(
		{1000} as string,
		ORD as string,
		TUS as string,
		{27-06-2014} as string,
		{Worked Premium Cabin} as string,
		{12390,27631,30035,35780} as string,
		{0} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> getSalesCampaign
getJson foldDown(unroll(conversions),
	mapColumn(
		id = id,
		type = type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 sink(input(
		{Flight#} as string,
		Origin as string,
		Dest as string,
		FlightDate as string,
		CampaignDetails as string,
		SalesAmt as string,
		Currency as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['mc186080_xchange_csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> getcsv
